title: Hanes Men's Sweatshirt, EcoSmart Fleece Crewneck Sweatshirt, Big & Tall Available, 1 or 2-Pack
description: This medium weight 7.8-oz fleece sweatshirt is made with up to 5% polyester created from recycled plastic, features a nice basic pullover style, and is available in multiple colors and sizes.

reviews.text: Great sweatshirt! I ordered large to make it oversized and it fit well. I’m usually a small -medium and 5’3 weighing 128.
Good quality and fit is perfect. Normally wear a medium but purchased size large. Medium would have been too tight after drying.
This sweatshirt is very comfortable, it fit me great and it was a reasonable price. Thank you Hanes!
Not super thick but just right for what you need. Unless you’re looking to survive the Alaskan tundra then I recommend buying 4.
Would prefer it to be thicker but at this price point, I really can’t complain. It's a decent fleece sweatshirt that'll provide some warmth.
